labels.categories: PEG Component LWC CMS Component Title
labels.shortDescription: Title displayed on the sfpegPageEditor component header

labels.categories: PEG Component LWC CMS Component Help
labels.shortDescription: Help message displayed on the sfpegPageEditor component header
labels.value: Component to help you enter and update more easily some of the page fields with slightly technical content. You may switch each individual field in edit mode to update its value in the main Content Edit section. Please remember to save your changes before leaving the page.

labels.categories: PEG Component LWC CMS Component Error Message
labels.shortDescription: Errort message for the sfpegPageEditor component when Content is not sfpegPage
labels.value: This component may be used only with sfpegPage Content Type records.
